Description:
- During my inspection I noted that: 1. The 230V ac consumer unit in your portacabin had blanks missing and was 
therefore not constructed or maintained in a condition to prevent, so far as is reasonably practicable, danger. 
2. Defects were identified with the flexible cables that supplied two 230V ac portable vacuum cleaners and were
therefore not constructed or maintained in a condition to prevent, so far as is reasonably practicable, danger.
Prohibition Notices were served on the 230V ac consumer unit and the two portable vacuum cleaners. I also 
identified that your 230V ac outside sockets located on your forecourt/public rest area were not additionally protected 
by a suitably rated 30ma residual current device, where there is a risk of serious personal injury and/or death.

You have failed to ensure that the electrical flexible cable that supplies your vacuum cleaner is of such construction to prevent, so far as is reasonably practicable, in that the flexible cable was pulled out of the terminals exposing single conductors.

PN2 -You have failed to ensure that electrical flexible cable is intact and had insulating tape and a joint.

PN 3 - You have failed to ensure that the equipment is of such construction to prevent, so far as is reasonably practicable, danger in that the equipment is permitting access to live exposed conductors.
